item.title: The Utopia Trap: Why Humans Keep Chasing Impossible Dreams
item.description:
Let’s be honest with ourselves for a second. Every generation believes it can fix what the previous one broke. Every political movement promises a better tomorrow. Every self-help book guarantees transformation. We’re obsessed with the idea that somewhere, somehow, there’s a perfect life waiting for usâ€”if we just find the right formula.

But here’s the uncomfortable truth: Utopia doesn’t exist. And maybe it shouldn’t.

The Great Utopia Experiments

History is littered with attempts to build the perfect society. Brook Farm in Massachusetts. The Oneida Community. Shaker villages. The list goes on and on. Smart, well-intentioned people packed their bags, left “corrupt” society behind, and headed into the wilderness to build something new.
